sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ThumbsUp, ThumbsDown, CheckCircle, ExternalLink, Twitter, MessageSquare, Filter } from 'lucide-react'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; const ProfilePage = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('profile'); // Use official from location state or create mock data matching spreadsheet const [official, setOfficial] = useState(location.state?.official || { id: 1, name: "Priya Reddy", position: "MLA - Bangalore South", party: "Indian National Congress", constituency: "Bangalore South", tenure: "2018–Present", dynastyStatus: "Self-Made", score: 87, image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Priya", approvals: 2847, disapprovals: 423, promises: 24, completed: 18, inProgress: 4, broken: 2, lastUpdated: "2 hours ago", sources: { myneta: true, eci: true, twitter: true, news: 15, govt: 8 }, discussions: 156, // Profile Details (Tab 1) profileDetails: { education: { value: "MBA from IIM Bangalore", sourceUrl: "https://myneta.info/priya-reddy" }, assets: { value: "₹2.5 Crores", sourceUrl: "https://eci.gov.in/affidavit/priya-reddy" }, liabilities: { value: "₹45 Lakhs", sourceUrl: "https://eci.gov.in/affidavit/priya-reddy" }, criminalCases: { value: "0 Cases", sourceUrl: "https://myneta.info/priya-reddy" }, age: { value: "42 years", sourceUrl: "https://myneta.info/priya-reddy" }, contactEmail: { value: "priya.reddy@karnataka.gov.in", sourceUrl: "https://karnataka.gov.in/officials" } } }); const mockPromises = [ { title: "Build 5 new schools", status: "completed", date: "2024-08", progress: 100, sourceUrl: "https://twitter.com/priyareddy/status/123456" }, { title: "Improve road infrastructure (15 km)", status: "in-progress", date: "2024-12", progress: 65, sourceUrl: "https://karnataka.gov.in/road-project-2024" }, { title: "Install 50 CCTV cameras", status: "in-progress", date: "2025-03", progress: 40, sourceUrl: "https://bbc.com/news/bangalore-cctv-2025" }, { title: "Reduce power cuts by 50%", status: "broken", date: "2023-06", progress: 20, sourceUrl: "https://thehindu.com/news/bangalore-power" } ]; const activityTimeline = [ { date: "2025-10-24", event: "Road improvement project announced", source: "Twitter", sourceUrl: "https://twitter.com/priyareddy/status/789456" }, { date: "2025-10-22", event: "Constituency meeting on water supply", source: "News", sourceUrl: "https://deccanherald.com/bangalore-water-meeting" }, { date: "2025-10-20", event: "Promised 10 new schools", source: "Public Speech", sourceUrl: "https://youtube.com/watch?v=xyz123" } ]; const comparisons = [ { statement: { text: "Complete metro phase 2 by Dec 2024", source: "Tweet - Oct 2023", sourceUrl: "https://twitter.com/priyareddy/status/456789" }, reality: { text: "Metro delayed to June 2025", source: "Govt Records - Jan 2025", sourceUrl: "https://bmrc.co.in/phase2-delay-notice", status: "Delayed" } }, { statement: { text: "Promised 24/7 water supply", source: "Rally - Mar 2023", sourceUrl: "https://youtube.com/watch?v=rally2023" }, reality: { text: "Water supply: 18 hours average", source: "BWSSB Data - Oct 2025", sourceUrl: "https://bwssb.gov.in/water-supply-data", status: "Unfulfilled" } } ]; return (

Social Record Platform

— Open civic forum
{/* Profile Header */}

{official.name}

{official.position}

Party: {official.party}

Tenure: {official.tenure}

Dynasty Status: {official.dynastyStatus}

{official.score}
{/* Tabs */}
{['profile', 'promises', 'activity', 'compare', 'forum'].map(tab => ( ))}
{/* Tab Content */}
{activeTab === 'profile' && (

Profile Details

Static details with source links for verification

{official.profileDetails && Object.entries(official.profileDetails).map(([key, data]) => (

{key.replace(/([A-Z])/g, ' $1').trim()}

{data.value}

{ e.currentTarget.style.background = '#1d4ed8'; e.currentTarget.style.color = 'white'; }} onMouseLeave={(e) => { e.currentTarget.style.background = 'transparent'; e.currentTarget.style.color = '#1d4ed8'; }} > Source
))}
{/* Summary Score Section */}

Summary Score

{official.completed}
Done
{official.inProgress}
Progress
{official.broken}
Broken
)} {activeTab === 'promises' && (

Promise Tracking

{/* Summary Score at top of Promises tab */}

Summary Score

{official.completed}
Done
{official.inProgress}
Progress
{official.broken}
Broken
{mockPromises.map((promise, idx) => (

{promise.title}

Source

Promised: {promise.date}

{promise.status.replace('-', ' ')} {promise.progress}%
))}
)} {activeTab === 'activity' && (

Activity Timeline

Chronological list of events/announcements

{activityTimeline.map((activity, idx) => (

{activity.date} — {activity.event}

Source: {activity.source}

Source
))}
)} {activeTab === 'compare' && (

Compare: Statements vs Reality

Statement vs. Reality table for delayed/broken promises with separate source links

{comparisons.map((comparison, idx) => (

What They Said

{comparison.statement.text}

{comparison.statement.source}

View Statement Source

Ground Reality

{comparison.reality.text}

{comparison.reality.source}

{comparison.reality.status} View Reality Source
))}
)} {activeTab === 'forum' && (

Forum Discussions ({official.discussions})

User comments and discussion (no inline source links required for user comments)

Rajesh Kumar

Road repair work hasn't started yet. Can someone verify budget?

)}
{/* Action Footer */}
); }; export default ProfilePage;
